item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Apricot Chicken
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: BBQ chicken breast
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Black Coffee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Cheese Butter
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Chicken Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Chicken Hawaii
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Soda Bottles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby! Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Country Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Double Beef Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Fresh Lime
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Grand Italiano
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

548

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wellome!

Best burger ideas & traditions from the whole world

Make the thing Anything is Possible

Enjoy our luscious dishes wherever you want ORDER NOW

Our Quality

Chicken

Quality is our #1 ingredient. Thats why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Burger

Some of the worlds best cheese is made close to home! All our deliciously melty Mozzarella is made with 100% Canadian milk. Were proud to support Canadian dairy farmers.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Pizza Douch

Quality is our #1 ingredient. Thats why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW Forget the trendy pizza shops, This hidden spot makes the best New York-style pizza slice in naples Stephen Tindle CEO,apple "I would be lost without restaurant. I would like to personally thank you for your outstanding product." Nina Margaret CEO,apple "I am completely blown away. I would also like to say thank you to all your staff. It's really wonderful." Clara Manager "Without food, we would have gone bankrupt by now. Thanks food! The service was excellent." John Doe Manager Always Quality

Our Talented Chefs

Chef william smith Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.
Manager John Doe Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.
Chef Bradd L. Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.

We guarantee

30 Minutes Delivery!

If you're having a meeting, working late at night and need an extra push. Let us know and we will be there make an order

item.title: faq
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
How does this work?

Simply put, we deliver your favourite menu from fast-food restaurant of choice. Our platform enables you to enter your postcode and select a nearby restaurant of choice e.g McDonalds, KFC, …Wagamama e.t.c for delivery. Within each of these restaurants you will find their menus which you can add to basket, choose your payment method (PayPal or Credit / Debit Card) and submit. There you go, your order is sent to the selected restaurant or the nearby delivery driver where applicable.

Can I order from different restaurant at the same time?

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Our History
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About Our Food

Delivering Awesome Since 1960

Time flies when you do what you love. We know because weve been making great pizza since 1967. Along the way, weve grown to more than 750 restaurants from coast to coast, becoming a trusted brand and leader in the foodservice industry. Were proud of the quality food we make and the difference we make in communities across Canada. Weve made a lot of pies and memories over the years. Find out what goes into both!

Our History

1960

The beginning

Tom Managhan and brother, James bough PocoNicks a pizza restaurant at Ypsilanti Mich with the price of 500 dollar and changed its name to Poco , Inc 1968

Bad Luck

In 1968, Poco Pizza headquarter burn down by fire. In 1975, Amstar Corp, a sugar supplier name Poco sued Poco's Pizza for the name of Poco. 1970

Growing

Poco Pizza opened more 954 stores, increased total stores to 2,841 and became the fastest-growing pizza chain in the United States. The first Poco Pizza store opened in the United Kingdom, in Luton The Deep Pan Pizza 1990

Online Order

Poco Pizza opened more 954 stores, increased total stores to 2,841 and became the fastest-growing pizza chain in the United States. The first Poco Pizza store opened in the United Kingdom, in Luton The Deep Pan Pizza 2010

2,000th Store

Poco Pizza International opened its 2,000th store outside the United States. Domino's celebrates 40 years of development around the world. At the same time, global sales reach more than $ 3.54 billion. 2020

60 Years Celebrating

In 2010, Poco Pizza celebrated 50 years of operating. First store opened in Vietnam on 19 November 2010

item.title: About us page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wellome!

Best burger ideas & traditions from the whole world

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam.

Mauris tempus erat laoreet turpis lobortis, eu tincidunt erat fermentum. Aliquam non tincidunt urna. Integer tincidunt nec nisl vitae ullamcorper. Proin sed ultrices erat. Contact now

Make the thing Anything is Possible

Enjoy our luscious dishes wherever you want ORDER NOW

Our Quality

Chicken

Quality is our #1 ingredient. Thats why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Burger

Some of the worlds best cheese is made close to home! All our deliciously melty Mozzarella is made with 100% Canadian milk. Were proud to support Canadian dairy farmers.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Pizza Douch

Quality is our #1 ingredient. Thats why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW Forget the trendy pizza shops, This hidden spot makes the best New York-style pizza slice in naples Stephen Tindle CEO,apple "I would be lost without restaurant. I would like to personally thank you for your outstanding product." Nina Margaret CEO,apple "I am completely blown away. I would also like to say thank you to all your staff. It's really wonderful." Clara Manager "Without food, we would have gone bankrupt by now. Thanks food! The service was excellent." John Doe Manager Always Quality

Our Talented Chefs

Chef william smith Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.
Manager John Doe Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.
Chef Bradd L. Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.

We guarantee

30 Minutes Delivery!

If you're having a meeting, working late at night and need an extra push. Let us know and we will be there make an order

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What your client says

Nina Margaret CEO,apple Forget the trendy pizza shops, This hidden spot makes the best New York-style pizza slice in naples Rose Design "I would be lost without restaurant. Poco - Fast Food Restaurant WooCommerce WordPress Theme

into your site in a single click.

for you to work with your content.

Live Page Editing

Build and edit a page layout easily with Elementor page builder by dragging & dropping elements.

Mobile Layouts Responsive

Poco is made to make sure your website works well and smoothly on many devices and platforms.

Advanced Menus

Navigate through the whole website easily & quickly
with the advanced menus.

Top Page Categories

Poco is made to make sure your website works well and smoothly on many devices and platforms.

Advanced Live Search

This amazing live search comes with ajax product suggestions for a better user experience.

Advanced Filters

These functional filters allow users to sort out their wanted products quickly by selecting various filter options such as categories, size, price, and best deals,...

into your site in a single click.

for Customer Support Great design and layout. The customer service is outstanding, every question I had was answered within a day. I will purchase another theme in the future. item.title: Hawaii Vegetarian Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby! Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Hawaii Vegetarian Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: Mouth watering pepperoni, cabanossi, mushroom, capsicum, black olives and stretchy mozzarella, seasoned with garlic and oregano.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Hawaii Vegetarian Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Iced Coffee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

item.title: Italiano Original
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby! Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Molto Tagliatelle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Orange Juice
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Original Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Pene Salmone
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

item.title: Penne Funghi Chicken
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Pepperoni Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: Extra-virgin olive oil, garlic, mozzarella cheese, onions, mushrooms, green olives, black olives, fresh tomatoes.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Pizzaro Coffee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Red Chocolate Cake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

item.title: Stawberry Ice
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: This strawberry ice cream is the freshest of fresh. Its so creamy and has the perfect fresh strawberry flavor

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Strawberry Tea
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Summer Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby! Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size Allergies

728

Energy/Kj Egg

1054

energy/kcal milk protein

68

fat/g sesame

25

gluxit /g lactose

48

sugar/g gluten

548

protein/g mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: Shrimp, Red Capsicum, Green Capsicum, Onion, Chilli flakes, Lemon Pepper, Mozzarella, finished with Aioli

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Supreme Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I dont understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 511 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Trio Cafe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburgers own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients:Dr. Praegers Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48
